name: The First Bite
description:
You wake up from a nightmare in an unfamiliar log cabin.

Explore the house to find clues to why you're here and why you're seeing strange visions.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Works for Mac and Windows ideally

Game was made in a weekend for fun.

If you enjoyed it give it a five star rating and spread it around! Even give a donation, it helps a lot!

Stats:

Genre: Horror

Playtime est: Five minutes

Software: Made with RPG Maker MZ and Clip Studio Pro

Warnings: Features Jumpscares that aren't for the faint of heart.

Plugins: Visustella Horror and Evented Title Screen

Additional details: One ending, one Easter egg
